comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Miller_Gould ? The timing seems right as she married in 1913.

comment.author: 73588512@N00
comment._content: Does this image need to be flipped or was the caption written onto the wrong side of the negative?

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: johnny appleseed99:  You were right, the image needed to be flipped.  We've fixed that now.  Usually the writing is on the correct side, but sometimes we have to double check against the original negative.  In this case the caption was on the correct side and the stock number "2202-11" was on the other side.   Thanks for catching this for us.

comment.author: 96684819@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called 1910s Fashion, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
